name: Roasted Golden Beet Hummus
author: lutzflcat
summary: Golden beets are slightly sweet and really enhance the flavor of hummus. Typically made with chickpeas, this hummus gets its incredibly creamy texture from white beans. Optional garnishes include a drizzle of olive oil and a dash of paprika or some pomegranate arils. Serve with raw veggies or pita chips.
ingredients: 4 small golden beets, trimmed and peeled
1 (15.5 ounce) can great northern beans, liquid drained and reserved
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Quarter beets and toss in a bowl with olive oil
Place on the prepared baking sheet
Roast in the preheated oven until a knife can be easily inserted into a beet, 35 to 40 minutes
Place the beets in a food processor along with the beans, tahini, lemon juice, balsamic vinegar, cumin, turmeric, sea salt, and garlic
Blend until smooth, adding small amounts of reserved bean liquid if the consistency is too thick
Transfer hummus to a serving bowl
